quote: Be true to the game, because the game will be true to you. If you try to shortcut the game, then the game will shortcut you. If you put forth the effort, good things will be bestowed upon you. That's truly about the game, and in some ways that's about life too.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: It's the game of life. Do I win or do I lose? One day they're gonna shut the game down. I gotta have as much fun and go around the board as many times as I can before it's my turn to leave.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Games lubricate the body and mind.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Life is more fun if you play games.
author: Roald Dahl,  My Uncle Oswald

quote: I'm afraid that sometimes you'll play lonely games too. Games you can't win 'cause you'll play against you.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: It's never just a game when you're winning.
author: George Carlin

quote: Time is a game played beautifully by children.
author: Heraclitus,  Fragments

quote: War Game. You can count the dead, but will never have a winner or a loser. #Thinkpeace
author: Secli G

quote: I like video games, but they're really violent. I'd like to play a video game where you help the people who were shot in all the other games. It'd be called 'Really Busy Hospital.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: Do you wanna play? Everyone's dead, so I got bored. Did you come to play with me?--Wrath
author: Hiromu Arakawa

quote: Be a bit of a challenge; not because you're playing games but because you realize you're worth the extra effort.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: In the game of life, we all receive a set of variables and limitations in the field of play. We can either focus on the lack thereof or empower ourselves to create better realities with the pieces we play the game with.
author: T.F. Hodge,  From Within I Rise: Spiritual Triumph Over Death and Conscious Encounters with "The Divine Presence"

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: You can't outwit fate by standing on the sidelines placing little sidebets about the outcome of life. either you wade in and risk everything you have to play the game or you don't play at all. and if u don't play u can't win.
author: Judith McNaught,  Paradise

quote: When I play a game, I want to play, not necessarily laugh. If you try to make me laugh at the expense of interactivity, then you've just created another funny game that isn't very fun. The videogame medium itself is a terrible place for complicated humor, drama, and character development.
author: Doug TenNapel

quote: I play- it's kind of like a slice-of-life, LA women in their forties, playing forty kind of what's their friendship like, and what's their life like and so I just play one of the four friends.
author: Joan Cusack

quote: Every game is winnable if you change your mind about what the prize should be and your perspective about the players at the table.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Have you ever played a video game that didn't have escalating levels of difficulty? Well, life can feel like play, too, when we purposefully engage in activities that demand we test and develop our skills.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: Who dares, win
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: There's an old saying that applies to me: you can't lose a game if you don't play the game. (Act 1, scene 4)
author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

quote: Play to win, not "not to lose".
author: Dondi Scumaci

quote: There are much worse games to play.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quote: Life has but one true charm: the charm of the game. But what if we’re indifferent to whether we win or lose?
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Got it. Demon. Death. Doom.
author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures

quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her; but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cars in order to win the game.
author: Voltaire

quote: Oh the places you'll go! There is fun to be done! There are points to be scored. There are games to be won. And the magical things you can do with that ball will make you the winning-est winner of all.
author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You’ll Go!

quote: It's taken me all my life to learn what not to play.
author: Dizzy Gillespie

quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
author: Voltaire

quote: In life, unlike chess, the game continues after checkmate.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.
author: Chill Wills

quote: The life of the enemy . Whoever lives for the sake of combating an enemy has an interest in the enemy's staying alive.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: You want to play house, you got to have a job. You want to play very nice house, very sweet house, then you got to have a job you don't like. Great. This is the way ninety-eight-point-nine per cent of the people work things out, so believe me, buddy, you've got nothing to apologize for.
author: Richard Yates,  Revolutionary Road

quote: When you play a game of thrones you win or you die.
author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones

quote: When in darkness....strike a match
author: John Paul Warren

quote: We played for about half an hour before I realized we were actually playing two different games. What I’d thought of as ludo was actually a game called gin rummy, and what Warren was playing seemed to be a mixture of craps and table tennis. Once we started playing by one consistent set of rules, though, the fun was really over.
author: Graham Parke,  No Hope for Gomez!

quote: I know - I'll play you for it,"Alice suggested. "Rock, paper, scissors."Jasper chuckled and Edward sighed."Why don't you just tell me who wins?"Edward said wryly.Alice beamed. "I do. Excellent.
author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn

quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Happy Hunger Games! And may the odds be ever in your favor.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: Any game plan? Xypher asked Sin.Don't die.I like it. Simple, bold. Impossible. Works for me.Kat scoffed at his sarcasm. What are you bitching about, Xypher? You're already dead.He laughed. You know, for once, it's good to be me.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon,  Devil May Cry

quote: Henry turned as if to dart out of the room, then swung around and stared at them, a look of confusion passing over his freckled face, as if he had only now had cause to wonder why Will, Tessa, and Jem might be crouching together in a mostly disused storage room. "What are you three doing in here, anyway?"Will tilted his head to the side and smiled at Henry. "Charades,"he said. "Massive game.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Angel

quote: No More Games. No More Bombs. No More Walking. No More Fun. No More Swimming. 67. That is 17 years past 50. 17 more than I needed or wanted. Boring. I am always bitchy. No Fun — for anybody. 67. You are getting Greedy. Act your old age. Relax — This won't hurt
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Love is a game of tic-tac-toe,constantly waitingfor the next x or o.
author: Lang Leav

quote: When you win and the other fellow loses, what do you see? A losing face. There is great joy in losing and making the other person win and have a happy face. Who will be the happiest person? The one who brings happiness to others.
author: Swami Satchidananda

quote: Life is like a game of chess.To win you have to make a move.Knowing which move to make comes with IN-SIGHTand knowledge, and by learning the lessons that areacculated along the way.We become each and every piece within the game called life!
author: Allan Rufus,  The Master's Sacred Knowledge

quote: the joy that you give to others is the joy that comes back to you
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: A man came up to me at a party and asked if I wanted to be in his video game. I of course said yes. And then it turned out it was 'Assassin's Creed', so that was great. They let me ad lib a lot and mess about and be very snarky indeed, and I'm thrilled by the success of all their hard work.
author: Danny Wallace

quote: Dieting is the only game where you win when you lose!
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.
author: Harsha Bhogle

quote: My motivation and aspiration is the same, being number one or being number five. So that's the truth. And my goal is the same - it's to always be happy playing, it's to enjoy the game and improve always.
author: Rafael Nadal
